headline: After a 50% Crash, This Tech Stock Is a Tremendous Value
summary: The Trade Desk stock was crushed on its first earnings miss in eight years.  The Trade Desk is undervalued historically, and its results are excellent.  The Trade Desk (NASDAQ: TTD) is one of them, and its stock is on sale.
